feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit the use of hyphens and colons for indicating relationships between ideas and for punctuation within sentences.

feature2.explanation: There is similarity in the lexical choices and technical terms used in both texts, indicating a common subject matter and vocabulary.

feature3.explanation: Both texts display complex sentence structures and technical details, maintaining a similar level of discourse complexity.

feature4.explanation: The tone and style in both texts are technical and focused on military strategies, showing consistency in narrative styles.

feature5.explanation: There are no significant spelling or typographical errors in either text, suggesting attention to detail in writing.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
